name: Kids Dinosaur Coloring Pages - Free Dino Game
name_original: Kids Dinosaur Coloring Pages - Free Dino Game
description:
Have some fun painting cute dinos!

This is a simple yet fun drawing app for kids - WITH NO ADS WHILE PLAYING!

Download the now and you'll soon be coloring lots of cute dinosaurs, having fun creating your own doodles in free draw mode, and laughing at the wacky color combinations created by the random button.

Game Features:

• NO ADVERTISEMENTS! No ads are shown while playing this kids game
• 16 coloring pages with highly detailed & cute dinosaurs (5 are available for free)
• 2 blank pages for painting on as a drawing pad / doodle pad (1 is available for free)
• Color the pictures by touching the different parts or draw freehand - or use both modes together for a unique drawing experience
• Magic wand paints the dino for you with lots of different colors
• Unlimited undos to go back step by step, keeping your kids doodle looking just right
• Coloring book pages are automatically saved and restored
• 16 different colors for painting and drawing
• Intuitive and simple interface for toddlers, girls, and boys aged 2 - 5
• Great dinosaur drawing app for both phone and tablet
• One in-app purchase to unlock the full game - protected by a parent gate to keep your toddlers safe

We believe this is a great free painting app for kids - but what do your girls or boys think? Download our coloring book game today, leave a review, and let us know!

Music: "Quasi Motion" by Kevin Macleod (incompetech)
developers: App Family Kids - Games for boys and girls
